verses.name: John 7:47
verses.text: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?

verses.name: John 7:48
verses.text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?

verses.name: John 7:49
verses.text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.

verses.name: John 7:50
verses.text: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

verses.name: John 7:51
verses.text: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?

verses.name: John 7:52
verses.text: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.

verses.name: John 7:53
verses.text: And every man went unto his own house.
